Name: Father
Description: This field is used to record the biological father of the documented person.

Name: Mother
Description: This field is used to record the biological mother of the documented person.

Name: National Affiliation
Description: This field is used to record the association of the documented person to a national body, usually indicating citizenship.

Name: Cultural Affiliation
Description: This field is used to record cultural group to which the documented person is affiliated. The larger group is meant as an actual existing cultural body of actors with their own identity.

Name: Relation
Description: This field is used to record another person with whom the documented person has a social relation.

Name: Relation Type
Description: This field is used to indicate the type of social relation holding between a referenced person and the documented person.

Name: Institutional Affiliation
Description: This field is used to record the membership of the documented person in an institution. The referenced person should be an institution.

Name: Institutional Affiliation - Role
Description: This field is used to record the type of role of the documented person held in relation to the institution with which they held affiliation.

Name: Institutional Affiliation Start Date - Earliest
Description: This field is used to record the earliest possible date of becoming a member of the institution by the documented person.

Name: Institutional Affiliation Start Date - Latest
Description: This field is used to record the latest possible date of becoming a member of the institution by the documented person.

Name: Institutional Affiliation End Date - Earliest
Description: This field is used to indicate the earliest possible date of ceasing to be a member of the institution by the documented person.

Name: Institutional Affiliation End Date - Latest
Description: This field is used to record the latest possible date of ceasing to be a member of the institution by the documented person.

Name: Associate
Description: This field is used to record an individual to which the documented person has a relation of association in the sense of  having participated in some overall event together. It implies a loose relation of co-participation in common activities, without implying direct knowledge or interaction between the parties.
